channel.title: AirChat (freedom of speech)
channel.description:
did anyone have looked for this project from lulzlabs:- https://github.com/lulzlabs/AirChat/ (true it looks kinda dead) but i hope someone make this real and effective. i liked these statements:-
Because we strongly believe communications should be free, Free as much as the air itself and all the waves should be. Free for everyone everywhere, free for those oppressed, free for the poor, free for the dissident, free for those living out of the boundaries of the infrastructure created for those who were lucky enough to have more than others
and this:-
People who were protesting against their govt resulting in the their internet being cut off. Even worse govt decided to fuck with their cellphones networks too
also here is a Code Review:- http://www.daemon.de/blog/2014/04/25/351/code-review-lulzlabs-radio-airchat/ if anyone have got news/update about them, hope u can list the websites or ..etc.

item.title: AirChat (freedom of speech)
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
did anyone have looked for this project from lulzlabs:-

GitHub

lulzlabs/AirChat

Free Communications For Everyone. Contribute to lulzlabs/AirChat development by creating an account on GitHub.

(true it looks kinda dead) but i hope someone make this real and effective.

i liked these statements:-

Because we strongly believe communications should be free, Free as much as the air itself and all the waves should be. Free for everyone everywhere, free for those oppressed, free for the poor, free for the dissident, free for those living out of the boundaries of the infrastructure created for those who were lucky enough to have more than others

and this:-

People who were protesting against their govt resulting in the their internet being cut off. Even worse govt decided to fuck with their cellphones networks too

also here is a Code Review:-

http://www.daemon.de/blog/2014/04/25/351/code-review-lulzlabs-radio-airchat/
